items.title: 3 "Top Picks" From Wall Street That Are Magnificent Buys Right Now
items.description: Another is a building products and controls company that's outperforming expectations.  UBS analyst Amit Mehrotra recently added Honeywell International (NASDAQ: HON) to his list of "top picks," which also includes industrials Johnson Controls (NYSE: JCI) and 3M (NYSE: MMM).  Simply put, Honeywell has the potential to outperform over the near and long term.
